verbose_text: There was a significant increase in the degree of neuropil vacuolation (p < 0.00007) and astrogliosis (p < 0.0138) in the midbrain of old jam2 KO mice when compared with age matched wild-type mice, whereas Iba1 positive microglial activation in old jam2 KO mice was less pronounced than in age matched wild-type mice (p < 0.035).
evidence: Iba1-positive microglial activation in old jam2 KO
